entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yorkton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:16 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yorkton Airport 9:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -29.9°C
Pressure: 104.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -33.2°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
